params._usdcToken: Address of the USDC token contract

depositETH(uint256,address).details: Deposit ETH into the contract with a specific lock duration

params.beneficiary: Address that can withdraw the deposit after unlock
params.lockDuration: Lock duration in seconds (must be one of the valid durations)

depositUSDC(uint256,uint256,address).details: Deposit USDC into the contract with a specific lock duration

params.amount: Amount of USDC to deposit (in 6 decimals)
params.beneficiary: Address that can withdraw the deposit after unlock
params.lockDuration: Lock duration in seconds (must be one of the valid durations)

forwardDeposit(uint256,address).details: Forward a specific deposit to another address after it's unlocked

params.depositId: ID of the deposit to forward
params.to: Address to forward the deposit to

getActiveDepositCount(address).details: Get the active deposit count (excluding withdrawn deposits)

getAvailableWithdrawalAmount(address).details: Get the total amount available for withdrawal for a user

params.user: Address of the user who made the deposit

getTotalLockedAmount(address).details: Get the total amount locked for a user

getTotalLockedETH(address).details: Get the total ETH locked for a user (excluding withdrawn deposits)

getTotalLockedUSDC(address).details: Get the total USDC locked for a user (excluding withdrawn deposits)

returns._0: Total number of deposits made by the user
Array of valid lock durations in seconds

isDepositUnlocked(address,uint256).details: Check if a deposit is unlocked

params.depositId: ID of the deposit to check
params.user: Address of the user who made the deposit

returns._0: True if the deposit is unlocked

isValidLockDuration(uint256).details: Check if a lock duration is valid

returns._0: True if the lock duration is valid

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Renounce ownership of the contract (owner only)

params.to: Address to send the rescued ETH to
Address to send the rescued tokens to
params.token: Address of the token to rescue

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfer ownership of the contract (owner only)

withdraw(uint256).details: Withdraw a specific deposit after it's unlocked

params.depositId: ID of the deposit to withdraw

renounceOwnership().notice: This will make the contract ownerless - use with extreme caution!
